ema thindu thirana, kala ramu saha wagakim pawarim pahatha paridi we. 01- wandi gewime kriyawaliya kadinam kirima sandaha adala disthrik lekam karyalaya magin wandi gewime katayuthu sidukirimata thiranaya kirima saha ee sandaha mulika washayen rupiyal miliyana 300 ka pa්rathipadana disthrik lekamwaraya wetha nidahas kirima kala ramuwa – 2017-07-30 wana dinata pera wagakima -disthrik lekam, badulla/ pa්radhani, jana sahana lekam karyalaya wyapruthi adhyaksha, uma oya wyapruthiya 02- wyapruthiya hethuwen haniyata path kuda waw 06 k idiri warsha samayata pa්rathama pa්rathisanskaranaya kirima sandaha rupiyal miliyana 100 ka uparimayakata yatathwa pa්rathipadana nidahas kirima saha adala pa්rathisanskarana katayuthu kadinamin awasan kirima kala ramuwa -pa්rathipadana nidahas kirima 2017-07-20 wana dinata pera sidu kala yuthu athara pa්rathisanskarana awasan kirima 2017-10-30 wana dinata pera sidu kala yuthuya.

gramashakthi janatha wyaparaya janathawata yapum manasikathwayen midi swothsahayen nagisitimata athwala sapayana wyapruthiyakwima wisheshathwayak wana athara, paudgalika anshaye da dayakathwayen eya me wana wita sarthakawa dipa wyapthawa kriyathmaka kere. 2018 wasare di madakalapuwa disthrikkaye gramashakthi samithiwalata laba di athi prathipadana pramanaya rupiyal miliyana 42k wana athara, ampara disthrikkayata rupiyal miliyana 66k saha thrikunamala disthrikkayata rupiyal miliyana 33k laba di thibe.
